Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Designs / Total Designs) * 100

Product Development+Design.KPIS: Time to Market for Exterior Designs
Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of exterior designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Total Time from Exterior Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the quality of exterior designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Exterior Designs

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for exterior design adhere to budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Exterior Design / Budgeted Cost for Exterior Design) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for exterior designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Feedback Ratings on Exterior Design / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in exterior designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Score Based on Exterior Design Innovations)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of iterations a design undergoes before final approval.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Total Number of Design Iterations

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency of material usage in design processes.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Optimal Material Usage / Actual Material Usage) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency of material usage in design processes.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Optimal Material Usage / Actual Material Usage) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of color and trim designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Color and Trim Designs / Total Color and Trim Designs) * 100

Product Development+Design.KPIS: Time to Market for Color and Trim
Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of color and trim designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Total Time from Color and Trim Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design.KPIS: Customer Satisfaction with Color and Trim
Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for color and trim designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Color and Trim / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design.KPIS: Cost Adherence for Color and Trim
Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for color and trim designs adhere to budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Color and Trim / Budgeted Cost for Color and Trim) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of color matching in designs compared to the specified colors.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Colors and Trims / Total Colors and Trims Tested) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the efficiency of material usage in color and trim processes.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Optimal Material Usage / Actual Material Usage) * 100

Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating for Color and Trim

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in color and trim designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Score Based on Innovations in Color and Trim)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of ergonomic designs that receive approval from stakeholders.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Ergonomic Designs / Total Ergonomic Designs) * 100

Product Development+Design.KPIS: Time to Market for Ergonomic Designs
Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of ergonomic designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Total Time from Ergonomic Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the quality of ergonomic designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Ergonomic Designs

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for ergonomic design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Ergonomic Design / Budgeted Cost for Ergonomic Design) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for ergonomic designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Ergonomics / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of ergonomic designs that pass testing criteria.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Ergonomic Tests / Total Ergonomic Tests) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in ergonomic designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Score Based on Ergonomic Design Innovations)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for ergonomic aspects of designs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Sum of Ergonomic Feedback Ratings / Number of Feedback Responses)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of CAD models compared to the final physical products or prototypes.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate CAD Models / Total CAD Models Reviewed) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Assesses the efficiency of CAD modeling processes.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Total Number of CAD Models Completed / Total Hours Spent on CAD Models)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete CAD models from initial concept to final model.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Completing CAD Models / Number of CAD Models Completed

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of CAD models that require rework before final approval.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of Reworked CAD Models / Total CAD Models) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for CAD modeling adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Actual CAD Cost / Budgeted CAD Cost) * 100

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the overall quality of CAD models based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of CAD Models

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures stakeholder satisfaction with the quality and effectiveness of CAD models.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Sum of Stakeholder Satisfaction Ratings for CAD Models / Number of Stakeholders)

Product Development+Design.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of CAD models successfully transitioned to prototypes.
Product Development+Design.FORMULA: (Number of CAD Models Transitioned to Prototypes / Total CAD Models) * 100
